version_description:
See & share photos, new data, and iOS 7 support:
• View photos of places and sightseeings uploaded by other users.
• Share photos of your favorite places with the Ulmon community.
• Updated map, address and POI data.
• iOS 7: convenient background sync.
• iOS 7: updated user interface design.

Devices with iOS 5.1 - 6.1 will remain compatible with CityMaps2Go and stay with the old user interface design.

▶ Please update your reviews for the new version. Your excellent reviews enable us to keep new free updates coming!

LIKE facebook.com/ulmon
FOLLOW twitter.com/ulmon

New simpler POI list screen.
Simpler access to search
Fixes iOS 7.1 hotel screen crash

▶ Fixes a bug that crashes the map search
▶ Compatible with the new iOS 7

version_name: is now also optimized for them! Enjoy in best quality!Also

version_description:
You own an iPhone 6 or 6+? Great! This Version is now also optimized for them! Enjoy in best quality!
Also, we did some glorios bugfixing!
PLUS: faster download of notifications

"Here it is, globetrotters! We’ve been working hard to bring you an even better Ulmon Guides experience. This is what’s new:

• Multifunctional lists – organize, plan and save great places for your trips even easier. With this nifty feature you’ll never again miss a spot you wanted to visit.

• Brand new design – beautiful photos, a customizable color system and intuitive,
organic menu navigation will help you to find your way and discover new places.

Do you like your new additions? Don’t forget to rate us then!"

"Here it is, globetrotters! We’ve been working hard to bring you an even better Ulmon Guides experience. This is what’s new:

• Multifunctional lists – organize, plan and save great places for your trips even easier. With this nifty feature you’ll never again miss a spot you wanted to visit.

• Brand new design – beautiful photos, a customizable color system and intuitive,
organic menu navigation will help you to find your way and discover new places.

Do you like your new additions? Don’t forget to rate us then!"

"iOS 9 compatible!

NEW: Receive personalized Travel Inspirations. Learn about interesting places and save them on your map! Get inspired! If you tell us what you are interested in, we personalize the messages for you.

Sharing is caring - You can now share what you want the way you want to share it. Facebook? Easy. Twitter? You got it. Personal message or e-mail? Sure, share away. You can spread the word of your inspiring travel experiences to all your friends or just specific ones.

Hmm, where to change the Pin color? Find everything easier with the new and smooth navigation through your personal lists!

Since many of you requested a comeback of our ""Show places on map"" feature: here you go!"

We completely overhauled the look and feel of our Ulmon Guides with a brand new one touch navigation!

Our maps and content have been dramatically enhanced to include:
● an updated map
● 60% more places
● most of the places now include tips, photos, opening hours, and more.

Additionally we:
● Enhanced our trip planning features with more list customization options,
● and if want to support us you can now make the app ad free by buying the Pro in-app-purchase.

If you have suggestions or questions please write to support@ulmon.com. We love to talk to you!

Happy travels,
the Ulmon team.
